site_name: Site known as Stratford Waterfrontbound by the Waterworks River to the southwestLondon Aquatics Centre and F10 Bridge to the southeastand Carpenters Road to the north and east.
description: Application under Section 96A of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended) for non-material amendments to vary the wording of conditions D.26F (Material Samples รป Public Realm) and D.26G (Material Samples รป Carpenters Land Bridge) of planning permission ref: 18/00470/OUT dated 25th July 2019 to allow commencement of development on Carpenters Land Bridge prior to the submission and approval of the external lighting and balustrade transitions relating to Carpenters Land Bridge.
